message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $13,000. I think it's a fair price considering the value it brings.

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go lower than $12,000. This product is truly valuable, and I believe this is a fair compromise.

I understand that you believe the product is valuable, but I'm still not convinced it's worth $12,000 to me. I'm willing to meet you at $10,500. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
